content.question: Which of the following best describes the woman’s attitude toward the man’s situation?

choices.label: The woman is generally supportive of the man’s preferences.
The woman encourages the man to take an even stronger stance.
The woman challenges the man’s thinking.
The woman is surprised by the opinion of the man’s parents.

content.answer: The woman challenges the man’s thinking.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
